Title: Come as You Are
Writer: Pierre De Clercq, Asta Philpot (original idea), Mariano Vanhoof (story)
Actors: Charlotte Timmers, Roos Van Vlaenderen, Robrecht Vanden Thoren, Karel Vingerhoets
Plot: Three guys in their twenties love wine and women but they are still virgins. Under the guise of a wine tour they embark on a journey to Spain hoping to have their first sexual experience. ...
